queryName: Service account private key file not defined
descriptionText: When `kube-controller-manager` is used, the `--service-account-private-key-file` flag should be set. This rule checks the `containers` and `initContainers` `command` fields for `kube-controller-manager` and verifies the presence of the `--service-account-private-key-file` flag. Setting this flag ensures the controller manager has a private key to sign service account tokens.
